com.facebook.react.animation

类 AbstractFloatPairPropertyUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.animation.AbstractFloatPairPropertyUpdater
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AnimationPropertyUpdater
    直接已知子类:
    PositionAnimationPairPropertyUpdater, ScaleXYAnimationPairPropertyUpdater

    public abstract class AbstractFloatPairPropertyUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnimationPropertyUpdater
    Base class for AnimationPropertyUpdater subclasses that updates a pair of float property values. It helps to handle conversion from animation progress to the actual values as well as the quite common case when no starting value is provided.

    • 构造器概要

                                    float[] returnValues)

                                    float[] propertyValues)

      • prepare

        public void prepare(android.view.View view)
        从接口复制的说明: AnimationPropertyUpdater
        This method will be called before animation starts.
        指定者:
        prepare 在接口中 AnimationPropertyUpdater
        参数:
        view - view that will be animated

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate(android.view.View view,
                     float progress)
        从接口复制的说明: AnimationPropertyUpdater
        This method will be called for each animation frame
        指定者:
        onUpdate 在接口中 AnimationPropertyUpdater
        参数:
        view - view to update property
        progress - animation progress from 0..1 range (may slightly exceed that limit in case of spring engine) retrieved from Animation engine.

      • onFinish

        public void onFinish(android.view.View view)
        从接口复制的说明: AnimationPropertyUpdater
        This method will be called at the end of animation. It should be used to set the final values for animated properties in order to avoid floating point inaccuracy calculated in AnimationPropertyUpdater.onUpdate(android.view.View, float) by passing value close to 1.0 or in a case some frames got dropped.
        指定者:
        onFinish 在接口中 AnimationPropertyUpdater
        参数:
        view - view to update property
